Welcome to Nixel

Have you ever wanted to remove Mario's mustache or give a goomba some eye brows? Maybe you wanted to draw your sigal on Link's shield?

Nixel is an editor for NES sprites. It can read and modify sprite data from Nintendo ROM files. It can not be used to modify any pallete data.

Go ahead and load* a ROM.

Load ROM
*ROMs are not uploaded to the server, all work is done locally in the browser.
